content:
• Twice-daily housekeeping service
  • 24-hour in-room dining
  • Complimentary High Speed WiFi
  • Plush terry cloth robes & Pierre slippers
  • Exclusive Etro toiletries
  • On-site 24-hour valet and hand-laundry services
  • One-hour on-site pressing service
  • Packing/unpacking service upon request
  • Overnight complimentary shoe shine
  • Bose Home Theater systems with DVD Players in all 49 suites; Bose Wave Studio with iPod docking station and DVD players in all guestrooms
  • Complimentary dog amenities (up to 15 pounds)
  • Complimentary online newspapers and magazines on check in
